DATA.HTML: Click the button below to proceed to Stripe and process your payment.

SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION:
SUCCESS: Returns true if a checkout form could be generated.
DATA.HTML: The HTML that should be rendered inside of an HTML form tag.
DATA.ACTION: The action attribute for the form into which the returned HTML is inserted.
DATA.META: This property will be removed. Do not use it in new implementations.
DATA.SCRIPT: This property will be removed. Do not use it in new implementations.

PARAMETERS.NAME: reference
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The external identifier for the payment flow process.

PARAMETERS.NAME: invoiceGUID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The GUID of the aXcelerate invoice for which payment should be collected.

PARAMETERS.NAME: redirectURL
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The URL to which the client will be redirected after payment processing.

PARAMETERS.NAME: cancelURL
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The URL to which the client is redirected if the client decides to cancel payment processing.

DESCRIPTION: Returns the HTML and form action required to process an invoice payment using the payment platform configured in settings.
